#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked

inline long long in() {
	long long c=gc(),v=0,f=1;
	for(;c<'0' || c>'9';c=gc()) {
		if(c=='-') {
			f=-1;
			c=gc();
			break;
		}
	}
	for(;c>='0' && c<='9';c=gc())
		v=v*10+c-'0';
	return v*f;
}

void out(long long n) {
	char b[10];
	long long i=10;
	if(n<0) {
		pc('-');
		n=-n;
	}
	do {
		b[--i]=(n%10)+'0';
		n/=10;
	} while(n);
	do {
		pc(b[i]);
	} while(++i<10);
	pc('\n');
}

main() {
	long long T;
	T=in();
	while(T--) {
		long long a,b,tmp;
		a=in(); b=in();
		if((a>0 || b>0) && (a+b)%5==0) {
			tmp=abs((2*(a+b))/5-a);
			out(tmp);
		}
		else
			printf("-1\n");
	}
}
